subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: José Canseco, an admitted steroid user who exposed other baseball players in his 2005 book, offered to keep Detroit Tigers outfielder Magglio Ordóñez “clear” in his next book in exchange for a financial investment, according to a person with knowledge of the situation.
